metadata.title: CVE-2020-36329 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. A use-after-free wasfound due to a thread being killed too early. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as systemavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36329` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
webp - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu1').
